'''Positive energy''' is an [[ego]] which provides you with one rank of [[negative energy]] [[resistance]]. It can be found on:
*Body [[armour]]
*[[Shields]]

==Strategy==
Although very useful in certain situations, [[fire]] and [[cold]] resistance are much more critical. Consider swapping in positive energy equipment when dealing with [[shadow dragon]]s and other nasty sources of [[draining]].
